ygData.subject: Re: weapons upgrade?
ygData.msgSnippet: That is EQ economics.  The only way items are consumed is if someone quits the game without selling off their goods or giving them away. As a server ages the
ygData.messageBody:
That is EQ economics. The only way items are consumed is if someone quits the game without selling off their goods or giving them away.

As a server ages the supply of powerful items increases at a faster rate than the population. The rules of supply and demand dictate that the prices must come down.

-----Original Message-----
From: John Cynkar <ref145@...>
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, July 30, 1999 2:44 PM
Subject: [warriors_eq] weapons upgrade?


Yeah, on mithaniel Marr Server, any more than 200p is considered a rip. But other servers have their prices. I can't say I am too happy about the prices dropping so much either.
